snippet.title: Abzorb: Now available on iOS & Android!
snippet.description:
Abzorb is a tilt game about consuming orbs by getting as close as you can to them without touching. Tilt your mobile device to collect blue orbs as fast as you can while evading the time-stealing reds.

Master 65 challenging levels and unlock new color schemes with the stars you earn along the way.

You'll also get to impress your friends and enrage your enemies with 9 different leaderboards on both Game Center and Google Play Games!

App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/abzorb/id1001725199?mt=8
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.geraldp.AbzorbAndroid

Credits
Gerald Kelley (@geraldpkelley) - Creator, Designer, Artist
George Hufnagl (@grhufnagl) - Sound Designer
Dan Fitzgerald (@DFitzGerald1218) - Video Production (the video you're watching)
